title: Bug on MacBook Pro 2016

embed.description: Upload and share videos instantly. It's free and simple. No signup required.

body: Hi, my screen freeze during the game all is in the movie.

replies.body: I have the same issue. Has anyone figured out a solution?
I tried disable the hot corner, but my screen still went freeze.

We've been hearing some issues where mac hot corners are getting in the way for some players. It's difficult to tell in this video, but it looks your cursor might have hit a left corner of your game which caused you to tab out with hot corners--and not very effectively.  

As a temporary solution, you can troubleshoot by setting your screen in League to Windowed or Borderless Windowed.  You can also try[ temporarily disabling hot corners](http://osxdaily.com/2016/08/10/disable-hot-corners-mac/) altogether.  I hope that helps!
I tried disable the hot corner, but my screen still went freeze.

I'll echo the sentiments of these other folks here.  I'm getting freezing 3-4 times per game, none of my hot corners are assigned, and playing League in anything but full-screen does not look feasible.  I hope a fix can be found soon.  Thanks for everything you do!

Same here.
Macbook Pro 15 inch with touch bar.
Played my first lol game on macbook pro and have the same issue. The interval of freezes can be delayed if you lower your video quality.
I hava a same problem :( (mbp w/ touch bar.

I have this same issue with macbook pro 2016 wth touch bar. was fine at first but i think 2 patches ago this freezing starting happening. attempting to play in windowed mode with rubberbanding mouse on screen edges is not playable (or i haven't figured out the correct set up for it). but full screen is my preference so please address the freezing happening. 
connection is good, hot corners are off/disabled, so that is not the issue
Hot corners are disable during the video but when I played in League to Windowed or Borderless Windowed my Leagues of Legends lag..and champions jerk..

Thanks for following up with me on that!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help individually with this.  We'd like to investigate this more to find what we can do for you.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
